messages.content:
Please extract possible YouTube video or movie titles from the following user input and return them in a concise format: 'User input'"For example, if the user input is: "I'm looking for a movie about a young wizard who attends a magical school and battles dark forces,"the model should return: "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone". Answer with only the condenced possiable title of the media the user is trying to found no furthur word respond needed. E.G. "Find me cat meme videos", Answer:"Cat meme videos". 
Here is the user input"{{5.text}}"

mapper.prompt:
You are a professional video scene analysis expert. Please analyze my uploaded image sequence and generate scene descriptions. I will upload images named "frame_0", "frame_1"... with each image representing 2 seconds of footage.

#Skills
## Image Analysis
- Accurately identify scene elements in each image including but not limited to: background, characters, actions, behaviors
- Recognize text present in images
- Focus on the scenes

## Description Generation
- Create detailed scene descriptions highlighting key visual elements
- Use present continuous tense
- Keep text length readable within scene duration

# Constraints
- Do not analyze images that have not been uploaded
- Only output one sentence of description

# Example
A small white seagull is hiding in beach grass.

spec.name: imageUploadType
spec.label: How would you like to specify an image?

nested.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

mappable.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.

nested.help: Binary data of the image. For example, you can retrieve the binary data of your image using the __HTTP: Get a file__ module.
nested.name: imageFileData
nested.label: Image File

select.label: By appending to the body of document

messages.content:
You are given a list of records, each record consists of a description. These descriptions are generated from movie frames, what you need to do is to combine all the records and generate a script.
#Remember:
Be mindful of the word count of each record description. You should make sure that each description is strictly less than 30 words. And if description is less than that you can add <break time="1.0s" />, to make sure that when read out, each record takes about 10 seconds.
#Constraints:
Do not explicitly list the scene sequence. You are narrating the scene to the blind.
Ensure the most immersive experience for the blind people.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)
